title: Mythicmobs世界随机刷新不出怪物
author: Iama小鸭
txt_content:
Mythicmobs世界随机刷新不出怪物 下面是代码


dijihuoshi:
  Type: BABY_ZOMBIE
  Display: '&7低级火尸&c筑基境圆满'
  Health: 100
  Damage: 40
  LegacySkills: 
  - ignite 50:60 =0 1  
  - potionself 15:60:3 <0.6 1  
  - forcepullnear 100:1:0 <0.8 1  
  Drops: 
  - exp 3 
  - exp 10 
  - huofengshisuipian 1 0.8 
  Equipment: 
  - wuqi:0 
  - yifu:3 
  - xiezi:1 
  Options: 
  - RepeatAllSkills: true 
  - AlwaysShowName: true 

  - KnockbackResistance: 0.8 
  - MovementSpeed: 5 dijihuoshi:
  Mobname: dijihuoshi 
  Worlds:  world
  Chance: 1 
  Priority: 1 
  Action: replace
  Conditions:
  - outside true
  - sunny true

replies.author: The_devil`zero
replies.txt_content:
第二部分改为
dijihuoshiRandom:

  Worlds:  world

  - sunny true
